results.description: Deepak Chahar takes 6-7 in Nagpur - the best-ever bowling figures in a Twenty20 international - as India beat Bangladesh by 30 runs in Nagpur.
results.shortTitle: India's Chahar sets T20 bowling record
results.title: Deepak Chahar: India bowler takes record 6-7 in win over Bangladesh

results.description: Bangladesh beat India in a Twenty20 international for the first time as they take a 1-0 lead in the three-match series.
results.shortTitle: Bangladesh in first T20 win over India
results.title: India v Bangladesh: Tigers seal first T20 win over hosts in Delhi

results.description: Fixtures, results and scorecards from Bangladesh's tour of India, featuring two Tests and three Twenty20 internationals.
results.title: Bangladesh in India 2019

thumbnail.altText: Bangladesh's Liton Das and India wicketkeeper MS Dhoni

results.description: Hundreds of people demonstrate in Bangladesh after Shakib Al Hasan was banned for two years for "failing to report corrupt approaches".
results.shortTitle: Hundreds take to streets over Shakib ban
results.title: Shakib Al Hasan banned: Demonstrations on Bangladesh streets over all-rounder's suspension

results.description: Bangladesh Test and Twenty20 captain Shakib Al Hasan gets a two-year ban for "failing to report corrupt approaches".
results.title: Shakib Al Hasan: Bangladesh captain banned over 'corrupt approaches'

results.description: The Bangladesh Cricket Board accuses players of a 'conspiracy' to destabilise cricket in the country by going on strike.
results.title: Bangladesh Cricket Board calls players' strike a 'conspiracy'

thumbnail.altText: Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan waves to fans after a match

results.description: Afghanistan's Rashid Khan becomes the youngest captain to win a Test as his side beat Bangladesh to record their second win in their third Test match.
results.title: Afghanistan beat Bangladesh for second victory in their third Test

thumbnail.altText: Afghanistan's Rashid Khan celebrates with his teammates

results.description: Ireland fail to reach the Women's T20 World Cup as they lose to Bangladesh by four wickets in the qualifier semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Ireland lose vital World Cup qualifier
results.title: Ireland lose to Bangladesh and fail to qualify for T20 World Cup

results.description: Results and scorecards from Afghanistan's tour of Bangladesh, including a one-off Test, and a T20 tri-series also involving Zimbabwe.
results.title: Afghanistan & Zimbabwe in Bangladesh 2019

thumbnail.altText: Afghanistan with the one-off Test trophy

results.description: Results and scorecards from Bangladesh's three-match ODI series in Sri Lanka - for whom Lasith Malinga makes his final one-day international appearance.
results.title: Bangladesh in Sri Lanka 2019

thumbnail.altText: Sri Lanka's Lasith Malinga is honoured before his final ODI

results.description: Sri Lanka's Lasith Malinga takes 3-38, including the last wicket of the match, in his final one-day international as the hosts beat Bangladesh by 91 runs in Colombo.
results.shortTitle: Malinga seals Sri Lanka win in final ODI
results.title: Sri Lanka v Bangladesh: Lasith Malinga takes 3-38 in final ODI

results.description: England World Cup winners Jofra Archer, Joe Root, Jason Roy and Ben Stokes make the team of the tournament, with two New Zealand players selected.
results.shortTitle: Four England players in World Cup team
results.title: World Cup team of the tournament: Jofra Archer, Ben Stokes, Joe Root & Jason Roy selected

results.description: BBC Sport reveals the World Cup team of the tournament - as voted for by readers.
results.shortTitle: Who made your team of the World Cup?
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Team of the tournament as voted for by BBC Sport readers

thumbnail.altText: A split image of India batsman Rohit Sharma (left) and Australia fast bowler Mitchell Starc (right)

results.description: Steve Rhodes leaves his role as Bangladesh head coach after their disappointing performance at the World Cup.
results.title: Bangladesh head coach Steve Rhodes steps down

results.description: From Rihanna's cameo to Carlos Brathwaite's near heroics and Ben Stokes' acrobatics, we look at the highlights and lowlights of the World Cup group stage.
results.shortTitle: Rihanna, Kohli & Stokes - best (and worst) of World Cup group stage
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Kohli, Shakib and Rihanna - best of the group stage

thumbnail.altText: Rihanna and Kohli images from World Cup

results.description: Plot your team's progress to the final - full results for the World Cup in England and Wales.
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Results

results.description: Pick your team of the 2019 Cricket World Cup - then share it with friends on social media.
results.shortTitle: Pick your team of the Cricket World Cup
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Pick your team of the tournament

thumbnail.altText: Shakib, Rohit and Mitchell Starc stock images

results.description: Watch nineteen-year-old Shaheen Afridi take six wickets against Bangladesh, the best figures ever by a Pakistan bowler in a World Cup match.
results.shortTitle: Watch teen Shaheen take six wickets for Pakistan
results.title: Pakistan v Bangladesh: Shaheen Afridi takes six wickets against Bangladesh

results.description: Pakistan hammer Bangladesh by 94 runs at Lord's but fail in their highly unlikely task of pipping New Zealand to the last World Cup semi-final place.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Pakistan beat Bangladesh by 94 runs
results.title: Cricket World Cup: Pakistan hammer Bangladesh but New Zealand into semi-finals
